A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: More destroyed legacy characters\, more focus on non-characters created by Disney Lucasfilm in order to chase a new fanbase which doesn't exist\, and ridiculous things like hyperspace ramming which break from canon and result in no Star Wars film ever making sense. Please complete Star Wars IX before moving all three pieces of terrible fan fiction to the non-canon Legends series were they belong. Thank you.
